dialog: Well that's completely off the point. Harry...

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Where have you been? Nevermind! Off to bed both of you.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: They get scary when they get older.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Ron you spoil everything!

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Let me see it again.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Ah yes, the time is close now. Harry! At last! Step aside Wormtail so I can give our guest a proper greeting!

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: You alright Harry? I just got in. Me!

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Harry you told me you'd figured the egg out weeks ago. The task is two days from now.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Really? I had no idea. I suppose Viktor's already figured it out.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: I wouldn't know, we didn't actually talk about the tournament. Actually we didn't really talk at all, Viktor's more of a physical being. I just mean he's not particularly... Mostly he watches me study. It's a bit annoying actually. You are trying to figure this egg out aren't you?

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: What's that supposed to mean?

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: I mean these tasks are supposed to test you, in the most brutal way they're almost cruel. And um, I'm scared for you. You got by the dragon mostly on nerve, I'm not sure it's going to be enough this time.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Hey Potter.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Cedric.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: How are you?

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Spectacular.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Look I realise I never really thanked you properly for tipping me off about those dragons.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Forget about it. I'm sure you would have done the same for me.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Exactly. You know the prefects bathroom on the fifth floor?

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: It's not a bad place for a bath. Just take your egg and mull things over in the hot water.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: I must be out of my mind.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: I'd try putting it in the water if I were you.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Myrtle!

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Long time no see.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: I was circling a blocked drain the other day and could swear I saw a bit of polyjuice potion. Not being a bad boy again are you Harry?

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Polyjuice potion! Kicked the habit. Myrtle, did you say try putting it in the water?

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Well. That's what he did. The other boy, the handsome one. Cedric.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Well go on, open it.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Come seek us where our voices sound. We cannot sing above the ground. An hour long you'll have to look, to recover what we took.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Myrtle, there aren't Merpeople in the black lake are there?

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Ahhh, very good. Took Cedric ages to riddle it out. Almost all the bubbles were gone...

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Harry, tell me again.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Come seek us where our voices sound.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: The black lake, that's obvious.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: An hour long you'll have to look.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Again obvious, though I must admit potentially problematic

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Potentially problematic? When was the last time you held your breath under the water for an hour Hermione?

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Look Harry, we can do this. The three of us can figure it out.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Hate to break up this scholar session but Professor McGonagall would like to see you in her office. Not you Potter, just Weasly and Granger.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: But sir, the second task is only hours away and...

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Exactly. Presumably Potter is well prepared by now and could do with a good night's sleep. Go. Now! Longbottom!

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Why don't you help Potter put his books back.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: You know, if you're interested in plants you'd be better with Gorshok's Guide to Herbology. Do you know there's a wizard in Nepal whose growing gravity resistant trees?

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Neville. No offense, but I really don't care about plants. Now if there's a Tibetan turnip that will allow me to breathe underwater for an hour then great.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: I don't know about a turnip but you can always use gilliweed.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: You're sure about this Neville.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Absolutely.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: For an hour.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Most likely.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Most likely?

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Well there is some debate among herbologists as to the effects of freshwater versus saltwater.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: You're telling me this now? You must be joking.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: I just wanted to help.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Well that makes you sight better than Ron and Hermione. Where are they anyway?

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: You seem a little tense Harry.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Do I?

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Welcome to the second task. Last night something was stolen from each of our champions. A treasure of sorts. These four treasures, one for each champion, now lie on the bottom of the black lake. In order to win each champion need only find their treasure and return to the surface. Simple enough. Except for this, they will have one hour to do so and one hour only. After that they'll be on their own.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Put that in your mouth.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: You may begin at the start of the cannon.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: What's the matter with him?

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: I don't know I can't see him.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Oh my god I've killed Harry Potter!

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: The Beauxbatons champion Miss Delacour has unfortunately been forced to retire. She will take no further part in this task.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: But she's my friend too!

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Only one.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Harry!

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Get him another towel.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: I want all the judges over here now.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: You saved her, even though she wasn't yours to save. My little sister!

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Thank you! And you... . You helped!

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Well... yeah... a bit

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Merci.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Harry!

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Hermione

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Are you alright? You must be freezing! Personally I think you behaved admirably.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: I finished last Hermione.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Next to last.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Attention! Attention! The winner is... Mr Diggory!

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: For showing unique command of the bubblehead shark. The way I see it, Mr Potter would have finished first had it not been for his determination to rescue not only Mr Weasly but the others as well. We've agreed to award him second place! For outstanding moral fibre.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: All that moral fibre eh?

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Blimey even when you go wrong it turns out right.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Well done 'moral fibre'.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Congratulations Potter, fine achievement. Well done boy. I'm sorry we haven't spoken, after all your story is one I've heard many times. Quite remarkable. Tragic of course, to lose one's family. Never whole again are we? Still, life goes on. And here we stand. I'm sure your parents would be very proud today Potter.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Bartimus! Not trying to lure Potter into one of the ministry's summer internships are we? Last boy who went into the department of ministries never came out!

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: And they say I'm mad.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: So I remember, I remember when I first met you all. Biggest bunch of misfits I've ever set eyes on. Always reminded me of myself a little. And here we all are, four years later.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: We're still misfits.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Maybe. But we've all got each other, and Harry of course. Soon to be! The youngest! Tri-Wizard champion there's ever been! Hooray!

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Mr Crouch?

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: A man has died here. And he won't be the last, you must take action.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: I will not. In times like these the wizard world looks to its leaders for strength Dumbledore.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Then for once show them some.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: The tri-wizard tournament will not be cancelled. I will not be seen as a coward.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: But surely that is what's right, no matter what others think.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: What did you say? What did you say to me?

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Excuse me gentlemen, it may interest you to know that this conversation is no longer private.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Harry! Harry how good to see you again.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: I can come back later Professor.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Oh not necessary Harry the minister and I are done. I'll be back in a moment. Minister, after you. Harry do feel free to indulge in a liquorice snack in my absence, but I have to warn you they're a little bit sharp.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Agh!

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Professor?

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Igor Karkaroff, you have been brought from Azkaban at your own request to present evidence to this counsel. Should your testimony prove consequential. Counsel may be prepared to order your immediate release. Until such time you remain in the eyes of the ministry a convicted deatheater. Do you accept these terms?

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: I do sir.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: What do you wish to present?

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: I have names sir. There was a Rosier, Evan Rosier.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Mr Rosier is dead.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Dead?

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Yeah took a piece of me with him though didn't he.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: I didn't know.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: If that is all the witness has to offer...

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: No! No! There was Rookwood, he was a spy.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Augustus Rookwood? Of the department of ministries.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Ya ya, the same. He passed information to you know who from inside the ministry itself.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Very well. Counsel will deliberate. In the meantime you will be returned to Azkaban.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: NO! WAIT! PLEASE! I have more. Snape, Severus Snape.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: The counsel is very much aware you have given evidence on this matter. Severus Snape was indeed a deatheater and prior to Lord Voldemort's downfall turned spy for us at great personal risk. Today he's no more a deatheater than I am.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: It's a lie! Severus Snape remains faithful to the dark lord.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Silence!

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Unless the witness possesses any name of genuine consequence this session is now concluded.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Oh no no no no no. I heard about one more.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: What's that?

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: The name...

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Yes?

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: I know for a fact this person took part in the capture, and by means of the cruciatus curse, torture of the aurer Frank Longbottom and...

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: The name! Give me the wretched name!

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Barty Crouch! ... Junior.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Get your hands off me you pathetic little men. Hello father.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: You are no son of mine.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Curiosity's not a sin Harry, but you should exercise caution. It's a pensieve, useful if like me you find your mind a wee bit stretched. It allows me to see what small things I've already seen. You see Harry I've searched and searched for something, some small detail. Something I might have overlooked, something that would explain why these terrible things have happened. Every time I get close to an answer it slips away, it's maddedning.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Sir, Mr Crouch's son, what happened to him?

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: He was sent to Azkaban. Destroyed Barty to do it. But he had no choice, the evidence was overwhelming. Why do you ask?

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: It's just that I had a dream about him. It was in the summer, before school. In the dream I was in a house and Voldemort was there only he wasn't quite human, and Wormtail was there too and Mr Crouch's son.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Have there been other dreams like this?

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Yes. Always the same one. Sir... these dreams, what I see, you don't think it's actually happening do you?

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: I think it's unwise for you to linger over these dreams Harry, I think it's best that you simply...

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Cast them away.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: It's a sign Severus, you know what it means as well as I.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Potter! What's your hurry? Congratulations, your performance in the black lake was inspiring. Gilliweed, am I correct?

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Yes sir.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Ingenious. A rather rare herb gilliweed, not something found in your every day garden. Nor is this, know what it is?

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Bubble juice sir?

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Veritaserum. Three drops of this and you-know-who himself will spill his darkest secrets. The use of this on a student is regrettably forbidden, however should you ever steal from my personal stores again, my hand might just slip over your morning pumpkin juice.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: I haven't stolen anything.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Don't lie to me. Gilliweed might be innocuous, but boomslang skin? lacewing flies? You and your friends are brewing polyjuice potion and believe me I'm going to find out why.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Earlier today Professor Moody placed the tri-wizards cup deep within the maze. Only he knows its exact position. Now as Mr Diggory...

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: and Mr Potter tied for first position they will be the first to enter the maze. Followed by Mr Krum...

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: The first person to touch the cup will be the winner. I've instructed the staff to patrol the perimeter, if at any point should a contestant wish to withdraw from the task he or she need only send up red sparks with their wands. Contestants, gather round.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: In the maze you'll find not dragons or creatures of the deep. Instead you'll face something more challenging. You see, people change in the maze. Oh find the cup if you can, but be very weary you could just lose yourselves along the way.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Champions! Prepare yourselves.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: On the count of three... ONE...

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Fleur? Fleur!

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Get down!

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: No stop! He's bewitched Cedric.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Get off me!

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: He's bewitched!

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Harry! Harry!

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: You know for a moment there I thought you were gonna let it get me.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: For a moment so did I.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Some game huh?

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Some game.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Go. Take it, you saved me!

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Together, on three. One, two, three!

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: You ok?

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Yeah, you?

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Where are we?

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: I've been here before.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: It's a portkey. Harry the cup is a portkey.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: I've been here before in a dream. Cedric, we have to get back to the cup? Now!

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: What are you talking about?

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: What is it?

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Get back to the cup!

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Who are you? What do you want?

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Kill the spare.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Cedric!

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Do it, now!

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Bones of the father, unwillingly given.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Flesh of the servent willingly sacrificed.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Blood of the enemy forcibly taken.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: The dark lord shall rise again.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: My wand Wormtail.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Hold out your arm.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Master. Thank you master.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: The other arm Wormtail.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Welcome my friends. Thirty years it's been, and yet you stand before me as though it were only yesterday. I confess myself disappointed, not one of you tried to find me.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Not even you, Lucius.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: My lord. Had I detected any sign or even a whisper of your whereabouts.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: There were signs my friend, and more than whispers.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: I assure you I never renounced the old ways. The face I have been obliged to present each day since your absence, that was my true mask.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: I returned.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Out of fear, not loyalty. Still you have proved yourself useful these past few months Wormtail.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Thank you master, thank you.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Oh, such a handsome boy.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Don't touch him.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Harry! I'd almost forgotten you were here. Standing on the bones of my father. I'd introduce you but word has it you're almost as famous as me these days. The boy who lived. How lies have fed your legend Harry. Shall I reveal what really happened that night thirteen years ago? Shall I divulge how I truly lost my powers? It was love. You see when dear sweet Lily Potter gave her life for her only son she provided the ultimate protection. I could not touch you. It was old magic, something I should have forseen. But no matter, no matter. Things have changed, I can touch you now!

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Astonishing what a few drops of your blood will do eh Harry? Pick up your wand Potter. I said pick it up, get up. Get up! You've been taught how to duel I presume yes? First we bow to each other. Come on now Harry the niceties must be observed, Dumbledore would not want you to forget your manners now would he? I said bow!

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: That's better. And now...

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Atta boy Harry, your parents would be proud. Especially your filthy mongrel mother. I'm going to kill you Harry Potter, I'm going to destroy you. After tonight no one will ever again question my powers. After tonight if they speak of you they'll speak only of how you begged for death, and I being a merciful lord obliged. Get up.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Don't you turn your back on me Harry Potter I want you to look at me when I kill you, I want to see the lights leave your eyes.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Have it your way.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Do nothing. He is mine to finish. He's mine!

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Harry when the connection is broken you must get to the portkey. We can delay it for a moment to give you time but only a moment, do you understand?

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Harry take my body back will you? Take my body back to my father.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Let go. Sweetheart you're ready. Let go! Let go!

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: No!

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Harry! Harry!

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Tell me what happened!

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: He's back, he's back! Voldemort's back. Cedric, he asked me to bring his body back. I couldn't leave him, not there.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: It's alright Harry. It's alright, he's home, you both are.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Keep everybody in their seats. A boy has just been killed. The body must be moved Dumbledore, there are... too many people.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Let me through! That's my son! My boy!

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Are you alright Potter?

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Does it hurt?

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Not so much now.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: I'd better take a look at it.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: The cup was a portkey. Someone had bewitched it.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: What was it like? What was he like?

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Who?

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: The dark lord. What was it like to stand in his presence?

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: I dunno. It was like I'd fallen into one of my dreams. One of my nightmares.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Were there others? In the graveyard, were there others?

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Um. I don't think I said anything about a graveyard Professor.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Marvellous creatures dragons aren't they? Do you think that miserable oaf would have led you into the woods if I hadn't suggested it? Do you think Cedric Diggory would have told you to hold the egg under the water if I hadn't have told him first myself? Do you think Neville Longbottom the witless wonder could have provided you with gilliweed if I hadn't have given him the book that led you straight to it? Huh??

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: It was you from the beginning. You put my name in the goblet of fire. You bewitched Krum. But...

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: You won because I made it so Potter. You ended up in that graveyard tonight because it was meant to be so. And now the deed is done. The blood that runs through these veins runs within the dark lord. Imagine how he will reward me when he learns that I have once and for all silenced the great Harry Potter.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Severus...

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Do you know who I am?

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Albus Dumbledore.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Are you Alastor Moody? Are ya?

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: No.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Is he in this room? Is he in this room?

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Harry get away from there!

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Are you alright Alastor?

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: I'm sorry Albus.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: That's Moody, but then who's...?

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Polyjuice potion.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Now we know who's been stealing it from your store Severus.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: We'll get you up in a minute.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Barty Crouch Junior.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: I'll show you mine if you show me yours.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Your arm Harry.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: You know what this means don't you? He's back. Lord Voldemort has returned.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Send an owl to Azkaban, think they'll find they're missing a prisoner.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: I'll be welcomed back like a hero.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Perhaps. Personally I've never had much time for heroes.

movie: Harry Potter and the Gobelt of Fire
dialog: Today we acknowledge a really terrible loss. Cedric Diggory was as you all know, exceptionally hard working, intricately fair minded. And most importantly a fierce fierce friend. I think therefore you have the right to know exactly how he died. You see, Cedric Diggory was murdered by Lord Voldemort. The ministry of magic does not wish me to tell you this. But not to do so I think would be an insult to his memory. Now the pain we all feel at this dreadful loss reminds me, reminds us that while we may come from different places and speak in different tongues, our hearts beat as one. In light of recent events the bonds of friendship we made this year will be more important than ever. Remember that and Cedric Diggory will not have died in vain, you remember that. And we'll celebrate a boy who was kind and honest and brave and true right to the very end.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: I'm sure. Nothing.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: So...congratulations Ron, Hermione...

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Come on, lets go back downstairs!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Yes, do go enjoy yourselves.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: What is that?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Yes it is, it's right there!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: I see them too, Harry.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Er...you are?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Luna. Luna Lovegood.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Well, thanks Luna.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Hagrid's cabin looks deserted.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: I hope he's all right...

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: What if he were still on his...

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: What if he's still on his mission from Dumbledore?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Yeah, could be.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: I beg a few moments of your attention, as I have a few start of term announcements. Right off, our caretaker, the good Mr. Filch, has reminded me for what he says is the four-hundred and sixty-second time that he had an annually updated list of various banned items, usually introduced by our humour experts Fred and George Weasley...

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: ... which are posted in an extensive list on the door to Mr. Filch's door.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Also, we have two staffing changes this year. Professor Grubby-Plank will be taking the post of Care of Magical Creatures post as Professor Hagrid is on...extended leave.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Additionally, we have Professor Umbridge, who has kindly agreed to fill the post of Defense Against the Dark Arts-—

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Hem, hem, Headmaster, if I could address the school?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Thank you, Headmaster. Now, how are we all doing tonight? I thought I would just say a few words. I am here at the Ministry of Magic's bequest, under Educational Decree twenty-two, which states that if the Headmaster of Hogwarts is unable to fill any teaching post the Ministry shall select one for the position.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: So why didn't your mum want you to come back to Hogwarts, Seamus?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: What?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Me mam didn't want me to come back to Hogwarts...

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Why?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Well...because of you...

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: What did I do?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: She...well, she figure's you're, well...you're lying about You-Know- Who and Dumbledore's a right nutter...

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Where'd she get that from?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: No one believes me, Hedwig. No one...

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: I'm alone...

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Sorry, Professor...

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Hmm, let's see, five points from Gryffindor for coming in late.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Now, as I was saying before Mr. Potter interrupted with his antics, your Defense Against the Dark Arts education has been rather fragmented and disjointed in your past classes, hasn't it?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: I will be following a pre-approved Ministry-prepared, theory-centered Defense lesson plan.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Copy this down.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Yes?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: I wanted to know something about your course aims.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Well, they should be perfectly self- evident.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: But surely the whole point of Defense against the dark arts is practical application?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Miss Granger, this class has been approved by Ministry experts. Are you a Ministry Expert?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: No, but-

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Then you have no business challenging those who are. We will be learning about spells in a safe, risk-free environment-

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: But we've got O.W.L.s coming up! You expect us to do the spells with no practice?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: What good's theory in the real world?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: What about Lord Voldemort?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Ten points from Gryffindor, Mr. Potter. Let me set the record straight.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Some of you have been told that a certain dead wizard has returned. This is a lie.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: It-is-NOT-a-LIE!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Mr. Potter, you have just landed yourself in detention!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: So, according to you, Cedric Diggory dropped dead? Or are you calling me a murderer?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: The boy's death was a tragic accident.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: It was MURDER! I saw it happen!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Mr Potter, you have earned yourself a week's worth of detentions!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Yeah, talk to somebody who cares.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: That goes to Professor McGonagall, dear.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Yeah. But she called me a liar!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Yes, Professor.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Good. Off you go.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: How can Dumbledore let that horrible woman teach? And when we're taking our OWL tests too!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: You reckon she's here to spy on us?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Well, not us specifically, but definitely Dumbledore and the Order.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Oh! Sorry...

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Yeah, well, you're going to have to get out of it somehow. We're holding tryouts for Keeper now Wood's gone, and I wanted to have the whole team there.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: I'll never get out of it, Angelina.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Well, just...don't do it again!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Well, Harry, shall we start on Snape's report?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Later, I've got detention.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Good luck, Harry.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Thanks.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Ah, Potter. Sit down.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: You're going to be doing lines, tonight, Mr. Potter, and you'll be using this quill.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: You will write "I will not tell lies" until I tell you to stop. Understand?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: There's no ink.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Oh...you won't need ink.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Problem, Potter?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: That's enough for this evening. Same time, tomorrow, and we'll see if we can get the message to sink in a bit deeper.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Hey, Harry.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Have you seen Ron? I can't find him anywhere.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: No, I haven't.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: He's been acting fishy all week. He's up to something.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: That's enough for tonight, Potter. Let's see that hand.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Harry! I tried out for Quidditch Keeper at the tryouts! I'm on the team!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Harry--bloody hell!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: He's got to be taken to the hospital wing.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: You said she was making you do lines!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: She is. But the quill has some sort of spell on it. It uses blood for ink.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: That old hag! She's sick!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: No, I'm telling anyone.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Harry, I really think you should tell--

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: No!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: I don't need his help. I don't need anyone's help.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Hagrid's still not back yet. I hope he's all right.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: I've asked Sirius about it.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Harry, you can't write to him! Owls are being intercepted, it isn't safe.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Don't worry, Hermione, I wrote it in code. Anyway, I figured I need to tell someone about Umbridge. My scar hurt again last night in detention.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Always knew she was a bit fishy.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: You think she's working for You- Know-Who?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Well, it's a possibility, isn't it?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: I suppose so. He could have her under the Imperious Curse, though it's unlikely. Dumbledore'd know.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Yeah, but Dumbledore didn't have a choice, did he? She'd been sent here by the Ministry.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Greetings my children. I sense even now that many of you have already made the transition into the beyond!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Today we will be continuing our interpretation of prophetic dreams. Please divide into your groups and discuss your recent night time visions using the text as a guide.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: And how long have you been at this post?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: I understand you are the descendent of the famous Seer Cassandra Trelawney?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: I am.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: And you are the first since Cassandra to have the Second Sight?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: These things tend to skip...several...generations.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Of course.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Now, if you would kindly make a prediction for me?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: The Inner Eye does not See upon command!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: My dear boy, your dream diary, if you please!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: My dear boy! My poor boy! These dreams are evil portends!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Yes, yes, oatmeal! Are you telling me you cannot see the signs? The foretelling of suffering and death?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Er...

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Perhaps you are not as in the beyond as the others.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Well, if that's the best you can do, Professor, I will be going.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Where are we going, Hermione?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: There we are.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: "The Hog's Head," Hermione?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Come on, I'll explain in a minute.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Hermione, what's going on?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: These are some people I mentioned my Defense Against the Dark Arts idea with.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: You mean about us teaching ourselves?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Hey, Harry.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Hey, Neville.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Uh...same to you, Luna.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Hear, hear!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Obviously, this will help us pass our O.W.L.s, but more importantly, it gives us the ability to protect ourselves from...Lord Voldemort. Several people jump or wince in fear at the name.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: That's the first time you've said his name.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: How do we know You-Know-Who's really back?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Dumbledore believes he is.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: You mean Dumbledore believes him.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: That's true, but I think we're drifting from the purpose--

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: It's okay, Hermione.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: I believe Voldemort's back because I fought him last year. Dumbledore's already told the school that. If you didn't believe him you won't believe anyone.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Well...anyway...uh, I think that in order to learn properly we'll need a teacher.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: But we're all students. None of us has the experience to--

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Someone here does. Everyone looks at her. She is staring directly at Harry.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Me?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: I for one would like to know why Potter's qualified and the rest of us aren't.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: One of the portraits said you'd killed a Basilisk in the Chamber of Secrets with that sword in Dumbledore's office.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Uh...well, yeah, I did.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Blimey, Harry...

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Wow...

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Can't forget that he saved the Sorcerer's Stone from You-Know-Who in his first year.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: And last year he got through the Triwizard Tournament!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Not to mention you dueled with You- Know-Who all alone and he still couldn't kill you!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: And you fought off those dementors that attacked you this summer.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: So all in favor of taking lessons from Harry?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Where are we going to meet?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: What about an unused classroom?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: That might work. I'll look into that.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Ok, good.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: I think we should put our names down, so we know who was here.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: I don't know...if it were found...I mean, Umbridge wouldn't like what we're doing...

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Honestly, Ernie, do you think I'd just leave it lying around? Besides, its enchanted.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Also, what should we call ourselves?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: What about the Anti-Unbridhe League?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: I think it should be Dumbledore's Army. There is excited agreement. Harry smiles at her.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: We'll let you know when we're going

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: I think that went well.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Yeah.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: And did you see Cho, Harry?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Well, she couldn't keep her eyes off you, could she?!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Harry, you won't believe...that Umbridge woman...this is too much!!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: What's she done now?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Follow me.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: "By order of the Hogwarts High Inquisitor: All student organizations, societies, teams, groups, and clubs are henceforth disbanded. Permission to reform must be approved by High Inquisitor Umbridge. No student organization can exist without the knowledge and approval of the High Inquisitor. Any student found to be a part of an illegal organization will be expelled immediately."

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: She refused to allow us to reform the Gryffindor team. We had to go to Dumbledore to get her to allow it.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Not only that, but what about the

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: This isn't a coincidence.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: She knows.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: She can't!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Look, we don't know how many people could have overheard our meeting and told her.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Or somebody at the meeting could have blabbed to her.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: No, they couldn't have. The parchment we all signed was enchanted, like I said. No one can betray the D.A. without us knowing.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: What would we do without you, Hermione?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Hedwig!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: She's hurt!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: She doesn't look very good.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Harry, you'd better take her to Professor Grubby-Plank. She'll know what to do.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Potter!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Where on earth are you going at this time of night?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: It's Hedwig. I think she's been attacked.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: What?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Yes, I think you might be right, Potter. She looks at Harry.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: London.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Well, give her to me. I'll run her

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: There you are.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Bear in mind, Potter, that channels of communication in and out of Hogwarts are being watched, won't you?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Yes, Professor.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Good. Now, off to bed.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Mr. Harry Potter!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Dobby! What are you doing here?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Dobby is cleaning, sir.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: What is it, Dobby.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Dobby...Dobby wishes he could help Harry Potter. Dobby has heard him muttering in his sleep.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Don't worry about it, Dobby. But I don't think you can help me.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Actually, there is something you can do, Dobby.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: I need a room where twenty-eight people can practice Defense Against the Dark Arts without the teachers knowing. Especially Professor Umbridge.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Dobby knows of the perfect place, Harry Potter! It is the Room of Requirement, sir. You can only use the room in times of great need. Whatever you need will be there for you, Harry Potter.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: That's brilliant, Dobby!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Dobby can show you now, if you wish, Harry Potter.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Better not, Dobby. School is pretty intense right now. We'll do it ina few months, before the holidays.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: ...and Slytherin is up forty to ten. Alica with the quaffle!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Weasley is our King, Weasley is our King, He always lets the Quaffle in, Weasley is our King!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Just ignore them, Ron!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: I should thank you, Weasley. You're definitely our best player!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Harry, are you all right?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Bet you loved that, Potter! Saved Weasley's neck, didn't you?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: I've never seen a worse Keeper! Maybe we should add some more verses to our little song. About his filthy mother!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: And his pathetic loser of a father too!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: But then, you like the Weasleys, don't you? How can you stand the stink? I guess it reminds you of your own dear mother!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Impedimenta!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Don't make me stupify you, Potter!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: My office. Now.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: In all my thirty-nine years at this school, I have never seen such a disgusting display.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Malfoy provoked us.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Of course he wanted to provoke you! He'd just lost!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: I cannot express in words the disappointment I feel right now.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: What is it, Dolores?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: I thought you might need some additional authority in dealing with these two.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: You thought wrong. Now kindly remove yourself from my office.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Now, I don't care what Malfoy said. Your performance out there was shameful. Fifty points from Gryffindor, and I'm giving you both a week's worth of detentions.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: I hardly think that's an adequate punishment for this.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Educational Decree Twenty-Five. It gives me, as High Inquisitor, the power to give punishments and privileges, and to alter those given out to students by other members of the staff.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: So, I think a life-long ban from playing quidditch should do the trick for both of these. Oh, and this one's twin as well. He was going to attack Malfoy as well.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Ban us...for life.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Yes, indeed, Mr. Potter.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Ah, I'll take your brooms as well.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Well, have a wonderful day.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: You've--!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: My hands are tied, Potter.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: I can't believe it...three players banned for life in one day...

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: I'm going to resign.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: You can't!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: I'm horrible! I should never have joined.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: If you quit, we'll be out four players!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: This is the worst day of my life.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: I know something that could cheer you up.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Hagrid's back!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Hagrid, what happened to you?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: I've fine, I tell yeh!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Come off it, Hagrid! We're not blind!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Can' answer tha', I'm afraid. Top secret, that is. Business of the Order.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: We know you were looking for giants, Hagrid. Dumbledore said so last year.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Oh. Well, yeah, I was, then. Went with Madame Maxime. Took us a month to get to their camp.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: A month?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: O' course! Can' do magic, not with the Ministry followin' us all the way. Plus, giants aren't fond o' wizards. Don' trust 'em.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: So what did you do when you found them?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: So...no giants are coming?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Well, not righ' away. We brought our message, an' I expec' a fair few'll remember it afore teh end comes.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Glad to see all of you could find this place all right.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Hey, Harry, what is all this stuff?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Loads of Defense Against the Dark Arts equipment. Hopefully we'll be able to get to all of it before the end of term.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Oh please. Professor Lockhart taught us that in second year.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Lockhart didn't teach as much as prune himself.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Besides, it works. I used it against You-Know-Who last June. It saved my life.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Right. Well, let's split into pairs and give it a go.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Expelliarmus!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Well done, Neville!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Look here, you lot! Neville's really got the hang of this one.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Expelliarmus!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: I did it! I did it!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Never forget this spell, Neville. It could save your live some day.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Okay, everyone. We've done a lot today, and I've seen some great improvement. That's it for now. We'll meet back here, same time next week!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: What's wrong with him?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Get McGonagall! Go!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Harry! HARRY!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Potter!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Wake up, Potter. Wake up. Please...

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Mr. Weasley's been attacked!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: You dreamed this, Potter?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: No, I saw it happen! I...I was there...

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: You're sure this happened, Potter?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix

dialog: Really, Potter. You expect to defeat all of us with your little school friends? Now hand it over, and they won't have to die here.

dialog: I haven't escaped from Azkaban for this!

dialog: No! If the prophesy is smashed--

dialog: What's so special about this

dialog: If you and your men will proceed to the Death Room, you will find several Death Eaters which I and some others have apprehended.

dialog: Seize him!

dialog: Minister, you have just seen You- Know-Who in the flesh only seconds ago! It is time to come to your senses!

dialog: If you insist on trying to arrest me, I am perfectly willing demonstrate how useless such an attempt will be.

dialog: You forget that Sirius was my friend too. You are not the only person on this earth capable of feelings, Harry.

dialog: You don't have a clue! You can't possibly know!

dialog: This pain is part of being human, Harry...

dialog: I don't care! I don't care!

dialog: You do care. You care so much you feel like you will bleed to death because of it.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Let me out.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: No.

dialog: You can't keep me in here!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: I daresay I can. And if you actually do attack me with that wand, Harry, I'm afraid to say you will regret it.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: It is my fault Sirius died tonight.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Harry, I owe you this explanation, to show you the failings of an old man.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: I already know all this.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Haven't you wondered why I haven't spoken to you, even looked at you, for months?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Well, yeah, I did...

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Sirius told me you believed there was a snake inside of you. This was Voldemort attempting to manipulate you. To protect you from this, I had you study Occlumency.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: But Snape stopped giving me lessons.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Yes. I thought he could overcome his feelings towards your father, but I was wrong. Some wounds cut too deep to be healed.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: He barely taught me, though. I always felt more open to it after the lessons. Like he was trying to open me to Voldemort—-

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: I would trust Severus Snape with my life, Harry. You have never recovered from your mistrust of him in your first year.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Sirius didn't trust him. Didn't believe he'd really turned to our side...

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Again, some wounds run too deep to be healed, Harry. Severus and Sirius never liked each other at school. This has never changed.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: During your Occulumency lessons, Professor Snape discovered that you were dreaming about the door in the Department of Mysteries.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: I've been dreaming about that all year, before Voldemort discovered the connection.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Yes. Voldemort has been obsessed with hearing that prophesy since he returned. Because of your scar, what he was obsessed with, you were obsessed with, in the form of dreams.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Once he discovered the connection, Voldemort had little difficulty in manipulating you into thinking he had captured Sirius.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: But I checked Grimmauld Place! Kreacher said--

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Kreacher lied. He wanted you to go to the Department of Mysteries.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Why?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Kreacher has been serving two masters for some months now.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: What?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Wait, where was Sirius when I tried to contact him?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Ah. Apparently Kreacher had injured Buckbeak to distract him in case you tried to contact Headquarters.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Sirius was tending to the wounds when you called.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: And Hermione said we should be nice to Kreacher!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: She was quite right, Harry. Kreacher is what wizards have made him. He is to be pitied, not hated.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Sirius hated him.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: He didn't hate Kreacher himself. Kreacher was a reminder to Sirius of the home he had always hated.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Yeah, he really hated that place. And you kept him locked up in there!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: I was trying to save his life!

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: I also knew that Voldemort would return one day. I played to his weakness. There is an ancient magic which Voldemort has always underestimated.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: This magic is what your mother gave you when she died. That protection would only work, however, if you were cared for by a blood relative. Your Aunt, Petunia.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: She never loved me.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Perhaps not. But she took you in, however grudgingly. As long as you can call your Aunt's house your home, you are protected.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: And now we come to the moment of terrible truth, the moment I have dreaded for fifteen years. The moment when I must lay another burden atop your already straining shoulders.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Do you remember your first year here? When you lay in the hospital wing fresh from your confrontation with Voldemort?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Do you remember what you asked me that night?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: I asked you why Voldemort tried to kill me.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: You have no idea the pain it causes me to tell it to you, even now. But unfortunately, I must.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: I don't understand, Professor.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Professor, why am I so important to

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: An excellent question, Harry. The answer lies in the prophesy.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Sir, it got smashed.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: That was not the only place the Prophesy is preserved.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: "The One with the power to vanquish the Dark Lord approaches....Born to

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: I'm not sure I understand all that, sir...

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: And...it means me?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Interestingly, there were two boys whom the prophesy could have been referring to. You and Neville Longbottom.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: So it's not necessarily me, sir?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: What if he chose wrong?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Why didn't he wait? Why attack when we were babies?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Voldemort had an informant listening to my meeting with Professor Trelawney. Fortunately he was discovered before he could hear the entire prophesy. Voldemort had to act immediately, he didn't know the rest of the prophesy. All he knew was that he had to destroy the child who would grow to be a threat to his power.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: But I don't have any special powers.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: There is a room in the Department of Mysteries which is kept locked at all times. It contains a force so wonderful and yet terrible that it is greater than death itself. It is that power which you have incredible amounts of and of which Voldemort has none.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: What is it, sir?

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: There is only the end of the prophesy which we haven't addressed. It states "neither can live while the other survives."

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: It is the final burden which I must place on you, Harry.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: One of us has to kill the other...in the end.

movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialog: Yes.

dialog: Better.

dialog: I've got something to tell you. Something important.

dialog: But not right now. I'm not ready.

dialog: Take your time, Harry. We'll be here when you are.

dialog: Hello, Harry.

dialog: It's the last night and I need to pack.

dialog: Oh, people take my things and hide them.

dialog: I don't think they like me much. Some of them call me "Loony" Lovegood.

dialog: Oh no. It all turns up in the end.

dialog: Sirius Black. Hermione said he was your Godfather.

dialog: Yeah.

dialog: Nonsense, we'll sort you out.  Any friend of Harry's is a friend of mine.  Right then, books out --

dialog: Um, sorry, sir, but I haven't got my book yet -- nor's Ron.  You see --

movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialog: Not to worry.  You can get what you need from the cupboard.

movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialog: Now, as I was saying, I've prepared a few concoctions this morning.  Any ideas what these might be?  Yes, Miss...?

movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialog: Granger, sir.  That one there is Veritaserum.  And that would be Polyjuice Potion.  And that is Amortentia! The most powerful love potion in the world.

movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialog: It's rumored to smell differently to each person, according to what attracts them.  For example, I smell freshly mown grass and new parchment and spearmint toothpaste --

movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialog: One of my best friends is Muggle- born.  She's the best in our year...

movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialog: Now Amortentia doesn't create actual love, of course.  That's impossible.  But it does cause a powerful infatuation or obsession. For that reason, it is probably the most dangerous potion in this room.

movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialog: Sir, you haven't told us what's in that one.

movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialog: Ah yes...

movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialog: What you see before you, ladies and gentlemen, is a curious little potion known as Felix Felicis. But it is more commonly referred to as --

movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialog: Liquid luck.

movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialog: Yes, Miss Granger.  Desperately tricky to make.  Disastrous should you get it wrong.  But brewed correctly, as this has been, it has remarkable powers.  One sip and you will find that all your endeavors succeed... at least until the effects wear off.

movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialog: But then why don't people drink it all the time?

movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialog: Because taken in excess it causes giddiness, recklessness and dangerous overconfidence.

movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialog: Have you ever taken it, sir?

movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialog: Twice.  Once when I was twenty- four.  Once when I was fifty- seven.  Two tablespoons taken at breakfast.  Two perfect days...

movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialog: So.  This is what I offer each of you today.  One tiny vial of liquid luck... to the student who, in the hour that remains, manages to brew an acceptable Draught of Living Death, the recipe for which can be found on page ten of your textbook.

movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialog: You should know that in all the years of my previous tenure at Hogwarts, not once did a student brew a potion of sufficient quality to claim this prize.  In any event -- good luck.

movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialog: How did you do that?

movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialog: Crush it.  Don't cut it.

dialog: No.  The instructions specifically say to cut.

dialog: No.  Really --

movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialog: Sh!

movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialog: Merlin's Beard!  But it's perfect. So perfect I daresay one sip would kill us all!  Your mother was a dab hand at potions, but this... My, my, what can't you do, m'boy? Perhaps you will save us all in the end...

movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialog: Here you are then, as promised. One bottle of Felix Felicis.  Use it well.

movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialog: Good evening, Harry.  You got my message, I see.  Come, come.  Sit.

movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialog: So.  How are you?

movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialog: Fine, sir.

movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialog: Enjoying your classes?  Professor Slughorn, for one, is most impressed with you.

dialog: Definitely.

movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialog: Sir?

dialog: ... I was merely curious. In any event, I'm sure you're wondering why I've summoned you here tonight.  The answer lies here.

movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialog: What you see before you are memories.  In this case pertaining to one individual:  Voldemort.  Or as he was known then... Tom Riddle.

movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialog: This vial contains a most particular memory -- of the day I first met him.  I'd like you to see it.  If you would...

movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialog: I must confess to a bit of confusion upon receiving your letter, Mr. Dumbledore.  In all the years Tom's been here, he's never once had a family visitor. Frankly, I was stunned to find that someone knew of his existence.

movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialog: I am not family.  But his name has been known to me since birth.

dialog: I see...

dialog: You can do things, can't you, Tom? Things the other children can't.

dialog: Yes.

dialog: I can make things move -- without touching them.  I can make animals do what I want without training them.  I can make bad things happen to people who are mean to me.  I can make them hurt... if I want.

movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialog: Who are you?

dialog: Thievery is not tolerated at Hogwarts.  At Hogwarts, you will be taught not only how to use magic, but to control it. Understood? I'll be going now, Tom.  Leave your window open tonight.  An owl will bring you a message.  Read it carefully.

movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialog: I can speak to snakes too.

I must greet the new Minister of Magical Transportation.  Class of '67. Mingle, m'boy!  Mingle!  We're all friends here.  And we run the world.

But they're tricky contraptions.  Require a tremendous amount of looking after.  Eventually they fell out of favor.
