dialog: Bill and Fleur.  Mum's been planning it for months.  Only thing that's kept her sane, I reckon.  She'll kill me if I miss it.  Kill you too.  Rather go face to face with You-Know-Who if I'm honest.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: I don't care about a bloody wedding -- no matter whose it is. I have to start searching for the Horcruxes.  It's the only chance we have to beat him.  And the longer we wait the stronger he gets.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Tonight's not the night, mate. You'd only be doing him a favor.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Do you think he knows?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: I mean, they're bits of his soul, the Horcruxes.  Bits of him.  When Dumbledore destroyed the ring and you destroyed Tom Riddle's diary all those years ago -- he must've felt something right?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: What I'm saying is, if we do this thing right, if we find the Horcruxes and begin to destroy them one by one...

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Won't he know he's being hunted?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: All together now!

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: One.  Two.  Three!

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Were you going to tell me?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Yes.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: And Ron and Hermione.  They'll not be going back to Hogwarts either?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: I see.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Dumbledore didn't want anyone to know what it is we're doing.  If I tell you, I'd be betraying him.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Zip me up, will you.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Seems silly, doesn't it?  A wedding.  Given everything that's going on.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Maybe that's the best reason to have it.  Because of everything that's going on.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Morning.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: How's it look on your end, boys?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Brilliant!

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Bloody hell, what's the Minister of Magic doing here?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Dunno.  But something tells me he didn't come to give away the bride.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: To what do we owe the pleasure, Minister?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: I think we both know the answer to that question, Mr. Potter.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: And this would be...?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Don't be coy, Mr. Potter.  Mr. Weasley.  Would you say you were close to your former Headmaster?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Dumbledore?  And me?  I dunno. I reckon I was just another Weasley to him.  He was always polite --

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: And you, Miss Granger?  How would you characterize your relationship?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: We were friendly, not close like Harry, but --

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: What's this all about?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: This.  Despite the fact that neither of your friends appear to have been particularly close to their recently deceased Headmaster, he saw fit to remember them in his will.  Now why do you suppose that would be?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: No idea.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Come now, you don't expect me to believe...

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: 'Herein is set forth the Last Will and Testament of Albus Percival Wulfric Brian Dumbledore.  First, to Ronald Bilius Weasley, I leave my Deluminator, a device of my own making, in the hope that -- when things seem most dark -- it will show him the light.'

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Dumbledore left this?  For me? Brilliant.  Er -- what is it?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Wicked.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: 'To Miss Hermione Jean Granger, I leave my copy of The Tales of Beedle the Bard, in the hope that she will find it entertaining and instructive.'

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Mum used to read me those!  The Wizard and the Hopping Pot, Babbitty Rabbity and her Cackling Stump...

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Oh, c'mon!  Beedle's stories are famous!  Babbity Rabbitty? No...?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: 'To Harry James Potter, I leave the Snitch he caught in his first Quidditch match at Hogwarts, as a reminder of the rewards of perseverance and skill.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: That's it then?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Not quite.  Dumbledore left you a second bequest:  The Sword of Godric Gryffindor.  Unfortunately, the Sword of Gryffindor was not Dumbledore's to give away.  As an important historical artifact, it belongs...

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: To Harry!  It belongs to Harry! It chose him!  It came to him in the Chamber of Secrets when he most needed it!

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: The sword may present itself to any worthy Gryffindor, Miss Granger.  That does not make it that wizard's property.  And in any event the current whereabouts of the sword are unknown.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Excuse me?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: The sword is missing. I won't pretend to be your friend, Mr. Potter.  But I assure you I'm not your enemy.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: You'll forgive me, Minister.  But it's a little hard to tell the difference these days.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Dumbledore said something very similar the last time we spoke.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Where is your guard, sir?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: I came alone.  I don't really need them anymore...

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: We want you to be the godfather.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: You mean -- But that's brilliant -- I... don't know what to say.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Say yes.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Hello, Harry!

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Oh, I've interrupted a deep thought, haven't I?  I can see it growing smaller in your eyes.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: No, 'course not.  How are you, Luna?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Very well.  I was bitten by a garden gnome only moments ago.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Gnome saliva is enormously beneficial!  Xenophilius Lovegood. We live just over the hill!

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Nice to meet you, sir.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: I trust you know, Mr. Potter, that we at The Quibbler, unlike those toadies at the Daily Prophet, fully supported Dumbledore during his lifetime and in his death support you just as fully.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Come, Daddy.  Harry doesn't want to talk to us right now.  He's just too nice to say so.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Sir?  May I sit down?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Mr. Potter!  By all means!

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: I found what you wrote in the Daily Prophet very moving, sir.  I take it you knew Professor Dumbledore well?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: I certainly knew him the longest, if you don't count his brother Aberforth -- and somehow, people never do seem to count Aberforth.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: I never even knew he had a brother, sir.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Yes, well, Dumbledore was always very private.  Even as a boy.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Sir, I was wondering if you'd had much contact with him before he died.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: The occasional owl.  Though it was strange...

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Strange, sir?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: It was the owls themselves.  They often arrived in distress.  It was clear they'd traveled great distances in some cases.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Could you tell me from where they'd come, sir?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: I'm afraid not.  Albus' messages mostly referenced our days together as schoolboys.  They were surprisingly intimate.  When he did speak of his current activities his words would turn elliptical.  Still, I sensed he was under great stress.  Why do you ask?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Just curious.  I was... close to Professor Dumbledore.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Well, he treasured you, Mr. Potter, I can attest to that.  I can also tell you that when a person passes, it's only natural to rue the things left unsaid, to regret the question never asked. I knew Albus nigh on 100 years, but in many ways he will always remain a riddle even to me.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Don't despair, Elphias.  I'm told he's been thoroughly unriddled by Rita Skeeter.  In 800 pages no less.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: That woman is a vulture, Muriel, and you well know it.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Someone has to pick the bones to get at the truth.  I read your obituary, Elphias.  Lovely.  But you did skate over some of the sticky patches in Dumbledore's life.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: I'm sorry you think so, Muriel.  I assure you I was writing from the heart.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Yes, well, Rita Skeeter hasn't made that mistake, I'm sure.  Word has it someone talked to her, someone who knew the Dumbledore family well.  You and I both know who that is, Elphias.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: A monstrous betrayal.  I can only conclude the rumors are true and that she has become untethered.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Who are you talking about?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Well, I don't suppose it'll be a secret once the book comes out. Bathilda Bagshot.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Who?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Who? Bathilda Bagshot!  My god, boy, she's only the most celebrated magical historian of the last century.  Don't they read History of Magic at Hogwarts anymore?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Oh, right.  Slipped my mind...

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: She knew the Dumbledores as well as anyone.  She'd have letters, perhaps an interesting photograph or two.  I'm sure Rita Skeeter would have thought it well worth a trip to Godric's Hollow to take a peek into that old bird's rattled cage.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Godric's Hollow?  Bathilda Bagshot lives in Godric's Hollow?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: For years now.  That's where she first met Dumbledore.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Excuse me?  You don't mean to say Dumbledore lived there too?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Of course.  The family moved there after his father killed those three Muggles.  It was quite the scandal. Honestly, my boy, are you sure you knew him at all?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: The Ministry has fallen.  The Minister of Magic is dead.  They are coming...

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Nice meeting you, Mr. Potter!

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Ron!  Ron!

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Harry!  Go!  Go!

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Where are we?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Shaftesbury Avenue.  I used to come here to the theater with my mum and dad.  Just popped into my head.  I don't know why...

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: This way!

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: We need to change.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: How the ruddy --

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Undetectable Extension Charm.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: You're amazing, you are.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Always the tone of surprise.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: That'll be the books.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Do you reckon everyone's alright at the wedding?  Maybe we should --

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: They were after you, mate.  We'd just put everyone in danger going back.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Ron's right.  Cappuccino, please.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: What she said.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Same.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Wicked scar.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: So where do we go from here?  The Leaky Cauldron?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Too dangerous.  If Voldemort's taken over the Ministry, none of the old places are safe.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: My rucksack.  With all my things. I left it back at the Burrow --

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: You're joking.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: I've had the essentials packed for days.  Just in case.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: By the way -- these jeans?  Not my favorite.  Bit tight.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Down!

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Stupefy!

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Petrificus Totalus! Go.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: She doesn't argue.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Lock the door, get the lights.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: This one's name is Rowle.  He was on the Astronomy Tower the night Snape killed Dumbledore.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: This is Dolohov.  I recognize him from the wanted posters.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: So what do we do with you, huh? Kill us if it was turned round, wouldn't you?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Suppose it's him that did Mad-Eye. How would you feel then?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: It's better we wipe their memories.  We kill them, they'll know we were here.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: You're the boss. Hermione?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: You're the best with spells.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Obliviate.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: How is it they knew we were there?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Maybe you still have the Trace on you.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Can't be. The Trace breaks at seventeen. It's Wizarding law.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: What?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: We didn't celebrate your birthday, Harry.  Ginny and I -- we'd prepared a cake.  We were going to bring it out at the end of the wedding...

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Hermione.  I appreciate the thought -- honestly.  But given that we were almost killed by a couple of Death Eaters a few minutes ago...

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Right.  Perspective.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: We've got to get off the streets, get somewhere safe.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: I have an idea.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Severus Snape?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Mad-Eye...?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: What was that about?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Mad-eye's doing, I'd guess.  In case Snape decided to come snooping.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Homenum revelio.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: It's a spell to reveal human presence.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: We're alone.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Lumos.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Dear Sirius.  Thank you for Harry's birthday present.  You'd think he'd been born on a broom.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: James says he's got the look of a Seeker, but then James would.  We had a very quiet birthday tea, just us and old Bathilda, who dotes on Harry.  Wormy dropped by late in the day, but seemed down and didn't stay long.  James is frustrated being shut up here, but Dumbledore's still got his Invisibility Cloak, so he doesn't have much choice.  By the way, Bathilda tells the most amazing stories about our old Headmaster. I don't know how much to believe. Can it really be true that Dumbledore --

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Harry!  Harry!

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Ron!  I've found him!

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Good!  Tell him from me he's a git!

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Harry, you can't just disappear. We thought --

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: It's from your Mum.  To Sirius. Bathilda Bagshot...?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Yeah.  They knew her.  She wrote A History of Magic, you know.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Did she now?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: I'm thinking maybe we should go talk to her.  She still lives in Godric's Hollow.  I'm thinking maybe she could help us.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Harry.  I can imagine why you'd want to go there, but... I don't think Bathilda Bagshot is going to know where Voldemort hid his Horcruxes.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Hey!  I think you two better come down here.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: The two clinging to the tree are Death Eaters for sure.  Dunno 'bout the bloke on the bench. Can't see us, of course.  But we'll have to be careful coming and going.  C'mon.  There's something else you need to see.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Lovely.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: To the Dark Lord.  I know I will be dead long before you read this... I have stolen the real Horcrux and intend to destroy it...

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: R.A.B. was Sirius' brother?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Yes.  Question is, did he actually destroy the real Horcrux?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Stop!  I order you!

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Kreacher...

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Been spying on us, have you?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Kreacher has been... watching. Kreacher always watches.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Maybe he knows.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Ever seen this before?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Kreacher, I own this place. Sirius left it to me.  Which means I own you too.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: That was Master Regulus' locket.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: That's right.  But there were two, weren't there?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Where's the other one?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Kreacher doesn't know where the other locket is.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: But was it here?  Did you ever see it?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Filthy Mudblood -- The Death Eaters will soon be coming for you!

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Blood-traitor Weasley --

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Ron!  RON!

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Answer her.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Yes.  It was here, in this house. A most evil object...

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: How do you mean?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Before he died, Master Regulus ordered Kreacher to destroy it. It was the last thing he asked of Kreacher.  But no matter how Kreacher tried, he could not..

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Where is it now?  Did someone take it, Kreacher?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: He came in the night.  He took many things, including the locket.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Who, Kreacher?  Who was it?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Mundungus.  Mundungus Fletcher.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Find him.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: As your new Minister for Magic, I promise to restore this temple of tolerance to its former glory. Therefore, beginning today, each employee will be required to submit themselves for evaluation. But know this:  You have nothing to fear... as long as you have nothing to hide...

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: My father will hear about this.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: He's not here, you fools.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: They have flesh memories.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Snitches.  They're never touched by bare skin until the Seeker captures it.  Even the wizard who fabricates it wears gloves.  That way, if there's a dispute, the Snitch can identify who first touched it.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: You mean... it remembers me?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: When Scrimgeour first gave it to you, I thought it might open at your touch -- that Dumbledore had hidden something in it.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Harry Potter!  So long it's been --

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Expelliarmus!

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: As requested, Kreacher has returned with the thief Mundungus Fletcher!

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Dobby has also returned with the thief Mundungus Fletcher!

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: What are you playing at -- setting a pair of bleedin' 'ouse-elves on me!

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Dobby was only trying to help! Dobby saw Kreacher in Diagon Alley, which Dobby thought was curious.  And then Dobby heard Kreacher mention Harry Potter's name, which Dobby thought was very curious.  And then Dobby saw that Kreacher was talking to the thief Mundungus Fletcher, which Dobby thought was very, very --

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: I'm no thief, you foul little git. I'm a purveyer of rare and wondrous objects --

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: You're a thief, Dung.  Everyone knows it.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Master Weasley!  So good to see you again!

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Wicked trainers.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Listen, I panicked that night, all right?  I never volunteered to die for you, mate.  Can I help it if Mad-Eye fell off his broom --

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Stop lying!

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Piece of advice.  Let's not rehash old times.  Got it... mate?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: When you turned this place over -- don't deny it! -- you found a locket, am I right?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Why?  Was it valuable?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: You've still got it.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: No.  He's worried he should have got more money for it.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Wouldn't be difficult, would it? Bleedin' gave it away, din' I? There I was, pitching me wares in Diagon Alley when some ministry hag comes up and asks to see my license.  Says she's of a mind to lock me up and would've, too, she hadn' taken a fancy to that locket.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Who was she?  This witch?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Well, she's right there, in't she? Bleedin' bow an' all.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Right. So let's do it.  Who gets who?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Well, unless one of you fancies wearing a skirt...

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Remember what we said.  Keep your eyes down.  Don't speak to anyone unless absolutely necessary.  Act as normal as possible.  Just do what you see everyone else doing. We do that -- and with a bit of luck -- we get ourselves inside. And then...

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: It gets really tricky.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Correct.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: This is completely mental.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Completely, utterly, without question.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: The world's mental.  Come on, drink up.  We've got a Horcrux to find.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: In case you're interested, I'm Reg Cattermole, Magical Maintenance Department.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Mafalda Hopkirk, assistant in the Improper Use of Magic Office.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: I'm nobody.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: You're somebody.  Be careful.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Morning, Reg!  Good luck today.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Oh... yeah.  Thanks.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: What do you reckon he meant by 'Good luck.'?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Apparently so.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: That's bloody disgusting.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Are those...?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Muggles.  In their rightful place.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Move it, will you -- oh, Runcorn! Forgive me...

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: You appear to be quite popular.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: I gotta tell you, I'm starting to freak out a bit.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: The Ministry must be hiring young these days.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: They're not Ministry.  They're Snatchers.  They hunt Muggle-borns and blood-traitors for a price.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: How long did you say this batch of Polyjuice Potion would last, Hermione?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: I didn't.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Cattlemole!

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: It's still raining in my office. Two days now.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Really?  Have you tried an umbrella?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: You do realize I'm on my way downstairs, don't you, Cattermole?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Downstairs...?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: To interrogate your wife!  If my wife's blood status were in doubt and the Head of the Department of Magical Law Enforcement needed a job doing, I think I'd make it a priority.  You've got one hour.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Oh my god.  What am I going to do? My wife's all alone downstairs?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Ron.  You don't have a wife.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Look, we'll go with you --

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: No, that's mad.  You two find Umbridge.  I'll be fine.  But how do I stop it raining?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Try Finite Incantatem.  Of course if something's gone wrong with an Atmospheric Charm --

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Level Two.  Department of Magical Law Enforcement, including Wizengamot Administration Services, Auror Headquarters and Improper Use of Magic Department.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: This is you.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Finite Incantatem, okay.  And if that doesn't work...?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: I don't like him being on his own down there.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Ron's been coming here since he was two years old.  It's us you should be worrying about.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: You really have horrible teeth, you know that.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: I say if we don't locate Umbridge within the hour, we go find Ron and come back another day.  Deal?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Ah, Mafalda!  Travers sent you, did he?  Good.  We'll go straight down.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Oh, yes... of course.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Reckon the old hag will be interrogating Mudbloods all day?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Sh...careful.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Runcorn.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Accio locket.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: All right, all right.  Let's calm down, shall we?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: It probably just snuck up here from Experimental Charms.  I think none of us will soon forget last month's Poisonous Duck...

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: R-Runcorn.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: M-morning.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Ron, it's me.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Harry!  Blimey, I forgot what you looked like.  Where's Hermione?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: She went down to the courtrooms with Umbridge --

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: I understand, Wakinda, but I can't be a party to that.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Hello, Reg.  Isn't Mary in for questioning today?  Try to have faith.  If there's anything Molly and I can do for you --

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Let me guess.  It's raining in Yaxley's office again?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Tell him to try an umbrella.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Arthur!  You know you're being tracked, don't you?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Is that a threat, Runcorn?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: No, Arthur.  It's a fact.  They're watching you.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: I'll tell you later.  Let's find Hermione.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Bloody cold down here.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: I'm half-blood, I tell you!  My father was a wizard!  Look him up! William Alderton!  He worked here for thirty years...

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: What is it?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: It's here...

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Reg...

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Mary Elizabeth Cattermole?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Yes.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Mother to Maisie, Ellie and Alfred?  Wife to Reginald?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Yes.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: A wand was taken from you upon your arrival at the Ministry today, Mrs. Cattermole.  Is this that wand?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Would you please tell the court from which witch or wizard you took this wand.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: But I didn't take it.  I got it in Diagon Alley, at Ollivander's, when I was eleven.  It chose me.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: No, no, I don't think so, Mrs. Cattermole.  Wands only choose witches.  And you are not a witch.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: But I am!  Tell them, Reg!  Tell them what I am!

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: What the devil are you doing, Albert?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: You're lying.  And one mustn't tell lies, Dolores... Stupefy!

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Expecto PATRONUM!

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Relashio!

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: You?  It's you! Reg, it's Harry Potter!

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: 'Tis, isn't it?  This'll be one to tell the kids.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Harry Potter...?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Harry... they've seen you.  We've got to get out of here.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Mary.  Go home.  Get the kids. I'll... I'll meet you there.  We have to get out the country, understand?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Mary!  Do as I say!

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: I'm sorry.  It's just --

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Long story.  Nice meeting you.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Piss off.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Seal the exits!  Now!

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Harry, quickly, in my bag, there's a small bottle labeled 'Essence of Dittany.'

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Quickly!

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Accio Dittany.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Unstopper it.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Hermione.  His arm --

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Just do it!

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: What happened?  I thought we were going back to Grimmauld Place.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: We were.  We were there.  But Yaxley had hold of me.  I knew we couldn't stay once he'd seen, so when he let go I brought us here. Ron got Splinched.  I'm... sorry.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Don't be stupid.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: It's all I feel safe doing.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Salvio Hexia... Protego Totalum...

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: What're you doing?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Protective enchantments.  I don't fancy another visit like we had on Shaftesbury Avenue, do you? Especially with Ron like this. You can get going on the tent...

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Tent?  Where am I supposed to find --

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Repello Muggletum... Muffliato...

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: How're the mushrooms?  Seem to be the only edible things growing round here.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: They're great.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Make sure to leave some for Ron.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: No problem.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: How bad is he?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: He'll be alright in a few days. Hopefully.  If we could take him to Hogwarts, to Madam Pomfrey --

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: So where do we go next?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Dumbledore had a theory.  He felt that the Horcruxes would not be made out of random objects.  And he felt they wouldn't be hidden randomly either.  We know of three so far.  The ring, which according to Dumbledore belonged to Tom Riddle's grandfather.  The diary, which belonged to Tom himself. And this, which -- again, according to Dumbledore -- belonged to his mother.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: It scares me a bit, that, thinking it's a piece of Vol--

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: No, don't!  Don't say it!

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: It's taboo -- You-Know-Who's name. That's how they track people now. It's how they found us in the cafe that night.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: How d'you know?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: I overheard a bloke from the Enforcement office talking about it at the Ministry.  Blimey, what's that smell?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Dinner?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Not bloody likely.  Smells like something Ginny would cook.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Tea?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Is that it?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: I know.  I felt it too. It's... it's like it's ticking or something, like it has a tiny metal heart, like it's --

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: ... alive.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: I hate it.  It's like he's here with us.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: That's why we're going to kill it.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Dissendium!

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Incendio!

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Expulso!

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Confringo!

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: It's angry.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: What're you doing?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: We have to keep it safe until we can figure out how to destroy it.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: I can put it in my bag --

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: No.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Seems strange, mate.  Dumbledore sends you off to find a load of Horcruxes, but doesn't bother to tell you how to destroy them. Doesn't that bother you?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: You wouldn't be lying to me, would you, Gregorovitch?  Because, I must tell you... that will only make it worse for you...

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Who was he?  The thief?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Just a boy!  Not of the village. It was he who took it.  I never saw it again.  I swear on my life.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: I believe you...

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: I thought it had stopped.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: You can't let him in, Harry. Dumbledore himself said it.  You have to close your mind.  It's too dangerous --

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: It's not a candle I can blow out, Hermione.  It always burns, even if it's just a flicker.  Can you understand that?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Tell me. What you saw.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: He's found him.  Vol--

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: You-Know-Who.  He's found Gregorovitch --

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: The wandmaker?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Yes.  How'd you know?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Viktor got his wand from Gregorovitch.  Most Durmstrang students did at one time.  What's he got to do with You-Know-Who?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: You-Know-Who wants something Gregorovitch once had -- dunno what.  But he's desperate to have it.  It's as if his life depends on it.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Don't -- It... comforts him.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Well it sets my teeth on edge. What's he expecting to hear?  Good news?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: I think he just hopes he doesn't hear bad news.  It gets him through the day.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: And what gets you through the day?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: We've all made sacrifices, Harry.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: How long before he can travel?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: I don't know.  It takes time.  I'm doing all I can.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: You're not doing enough.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Take it off.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Take it off.  Now.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Better?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Loads.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: It's cold.  Even though it's been lying against your skin for days.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: We'll take turns.  Okay?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: What's that?  That... smell?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Snatchers.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Good to know your enchantments work.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: He could smell it.  My perfume.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: We have to leave.  We're not safe here.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: I told you.  Ron's not strong enough to Apparate.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Then we'll go by foot.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: I'm hungry.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: We're all hungry.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Leave it.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Mum can make food appear out of thin air.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: No one can conjure food out of thin air.  Food is the first of the five Principal Exceptions to Gamp's Law.  The other four are --

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Oh, speak English, can't you?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: I said leave it.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: It'll be dark soon.  We need to find a place to sleep.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Good plan.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Yeah.  Brilliant.  Only, correct me if I'm wrong... wasn't that yesterday's plan?  And the day before that?  And the day before that?  Walk.  Sleep.  Walk. Sleep.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: My turn.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: He doesn't know what he's doing, does he?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: None of us do.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Wizards were here.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: I don't like this place.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: I want to go.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: I'll tell you in a minute.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Maybe you could tell me now.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Alright.  The Sword of Gryffindor? It's Goblin made.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Brilliant.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: You don't understand.  Dirt and rust have no effect on the blade. It only takes in that which makes it stronger.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: O-kay.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Harry.  You already destroyed one Horcrux, right?  Tom Riddle's diary -- in the Chamber of Secrets.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: With a basilisk fang.  If you tell me you've got one of those in that bloody beaded bag of yours --

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Don't you see!  In the Chamber of Secrets, you stabbed the basilisk with the Sword of Gryffindor.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Its blade is impregnated with basilisk venom.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: It only takes in that which makes it stronger...

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Exactly!  Which means...

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: ... it can destroy Horcruxes.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Which is why Dumbledore left it to you in his will.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: You're brilliant, Hermione. Truly.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Actually, I'm highly logical, which allows me to look past the extraneous detail and perceive clearly that which others overlook.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: There's only one problem...

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: The sword was stolen.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Yeah, I'm still here.  But you two carry on.  Don't let me spoil your fun.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: What's the problem?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Problem?  There's no problem.  Not according to you, anyway.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Look, don't be shy.  If you've got something to say, spit it out.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: All right, I'll spit it out. Don't expect me to skip up and down because now there's some other damn thing we've got to find.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Ron...

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: I thought you knew what you signed up for.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Yeah, I thought I did too.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: I don't understand.  What part of this isn't living up to your expectations?  Did you think we'd be staying in five-star hotels? Finding a Horcrux every other day? Did you think you'd be back to Mummy by Christmas?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: No, I just reckoned after all this time, we'd have actually achieved something.  I reckoned you knew what you were doing.  I reckoned Dumbledore had told you something worthwhile! I reckoned you had a plan!

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: I've told you everything Dumbledore told me! And in case you haven't noticed, we've found a Horcrux!

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Yeah, and we're about as near getting rid of it as we are to finding the rest of them, aren't we!

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Take it off, Ron.  Please take it off.  You wouldn't be talking like this if you hadn't been wearing it all day --

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Yeah, he would.  D'you think I haven't noticed the two of you whispering behind my back?  D'you think I haven't guessed what you were thinking?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Harry, we weren't --

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Don't lie!  You said it, too, you said you were disappointed --

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: I didn't!  Not like that!  Harry -- I didn't!

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Do you know why I listen to that radio, every night?  Do you!  To make sure I don't hear Ginny's name or Fred or George or Mum or --

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: You think I don't listen!  You think I don't know what it's like --

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Stop!  Stop!

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Go then.  But leave that.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: And you?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Me?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Are you staying?  Or coming?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Fine.  I get it.  I saw you two the other night.  Yeah, that's right.  Didn't know I knew, did you?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: What?  Ron, no -- please --

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: He's gone.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Salvio Hexia... Protego Totalum...

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: It's a Muggle station.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: You were right.  It's like you said.  Snitches have flesh memories.  But I didn't catch my first Snitch with my hand.  I almost swallowed it.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: 'I open at the close?'

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: What do you reckon it means?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: I don't know.  But look, I've found something as well...

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: I thought it was a picture of an eye, but now I don't think it is. It isn't a rune and it's not in Spellman's Syllabary either.  And it's been inked in -- somebody drew it -- it isn't part of the book.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Luna's dad was wearing that, at Ron- At Bill and Fleur's wedding.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: What d'you mean -- wearing it?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Around his neck.  Like an amulet. I didn't think much of it at the time.  You know Luna -- she's always got some mad thing or the other she's carrying around.  I just figured it ran in the family.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Why would someone have drawn it in a children's book?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Hermione, I've been thinking.  I -- I want to go to Godric's Hollow. It's where I was born, it's where my parents died --

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: And it's exactly where You-Know- Who will expect you to go. Because it means something to you.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: But it means something to him too, Hermione.  You-Know-Who nearly died there.  Wouldn't that be just the kind of place he'd hide a Horcrux?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: It's dangerous, Harry.  But I have to admit, recently even I've been thinking we might have to go.  I think it's possible something else is hidden there. The sword.  If Dumbledore didn't want it falling into the Ministry's hands, but wanted you to find it, what better place to hide it than the birthplace of the founder of Gryffindor himself?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Godric's Hollow is the birthplace of Godric Gryffindor -- I mean, 'course it is.  Obvious, isn't it?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Harry, did you ever even open A History of Magic?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Tossed it at Neville once when he was snoring -- might've popped open.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Hermione...

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Don't ever let me give you a haircut again.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: I still think we should've used Polyjuice Potion.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: No.  This is where I was born. I'm not returning as someone else.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Harry, I think it's Christmas Eve! Listen...

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Do you think they'd be in there? My mum and dad?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Yeah. I think they would.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Harry.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Is it -- ?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: No.  But look.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: Did you know he had a sister?

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: No.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialog: When Grindelwald was seventeen, he was expelled from Durmstrang. He'd started doing some twisted things at school -- experiments. A few teachers had always protected him, but they couldn't anymore.  After he left, he traveled for awhile, then ended up in Godric's Hollow where his great aunt lived, Bathilda Bagshot.

movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1

dialog: She introduced him to Dumbledore. It made sense.  Dumbledore's mother had just died, Grindelwald was troubled and they were both brilliant -- they'd never really had anyone they could talk to on the same level.  They did a lot of talking that summer.  But they always returned to one particular subject.

dialog: Just knew.  On account of Hermione's voice.  And sure enough, it floated toward me, the ball of light, right to my chest and then -- went straight through -- right here.

dialog: I could feel it inside me.  It was warm, like the first sip of a good cup of tea.  And I knew it would take me where I needed to go.
